Begin ColonyWolfKill

short doonce
short attack
short move

if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_9a" < 10 )
		Disable
	endif
endif

if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_9a" >= 10 )
		Enable
	endif
endif
